\newcommand{\ottfunclause}[2]{ #1 \equiv #2 \\}

\newcommand{\ottmv}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottkw}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottsym}[1]{#1}
\newcommand{\ottcom}[1]{\text{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulename}[1]{\textsc{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottcomplu}[5]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2\in #3 #4 #5}}
\newcommand{\ottcompu}[3]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2<#3}}
\newcommand{\ottcomp}[2]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2}}
\newcommand{\ottgrammartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{llcllllll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottmetavartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{ll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottrulehead}[3]{$#1$ & & $#2$ & & & \multicolumn{2}{l}{#3}}
\newcommand{\ottprodline}[6]{& & $#1$ & $#2$ & $#3 #4$ & $#5$ & $#6$}
\newcommand{\ottfirstprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottlongprodline}[2]{& & $#1$ & \multicolumn{4}{l}{$#2$}}
\newcommand{\ottfirstlongprodline}[2]{\ottlongprodline{#1}{#2}}
\newcommand{\ottbindspecprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}

\newcommand{\ottinterrule}{\\[5.0mm]}
\newcommand{\ottafterlastrule}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottmetavars}{
\ottmetavartabular{
 $ \textcolor{blue}{metavariable} ,\, \textcolor{blue}{x} $ &  \\
}}

\newcommand{\ottterm}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{term}  ,\ \ottnt{t}  ,\ \ottnt{u}}{::=}{\ottcom{term}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\textcolor{blue}{x}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{variable}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{()}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{unit}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{\{}  \lambda  \textcolor{blue}{x}  {:}  \ottnt{A}  \mapsto  \ottsym{t\}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{lambda abstraction}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t} \, \ottnt{u}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{application}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{case} \, \ottnt{t} \, \ottkw{of} \, \ottsym{\{}  \ottsym{()}  \mapsto  \ottnt{u}  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{pattern-matching on unit}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{case} \, \ottnt{t} \, \ottkw{of} \, \ottsym{\{}  \ottsym{(}  \textcolor{blue}{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \textcolor{blue}{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \mapsto  \ottnt{u}  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{pattern-matching on product}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{case} \, \ottnt{t} \, \ottkw{of} \, \ottsym{\{}  \ottsym{1}  \ottsym{.}  \textcolor{blue}{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mapsto  \ottnt{u_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{2}  \ottsym{.}  \textcolor{blue}{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \mapsto  \ottnt{u_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{pattern-matching on sum}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{alloc} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{allocate data}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{fillLeaf} \, \ottnt{u} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{fill terminal-type destination}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{fillLeft} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{transform sum-type destination into destination of first variant}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{fillRight} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{transform sum-type destination into destination of second variant}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{fillPair} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{transform product-type destination into a product of destinations}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{t}  \ottsym{[}  \textcolor{blue}{x}  :=  \ottnt{u}  \ottsym{]}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\otttype}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{type}  ,\ \ottnt{A}  ,\ \ottnt{B}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{1}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{unit type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{P}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{primitive type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \otimes  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{product type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \oplus  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{sum type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \multimap  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{linear function type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lfloor  \ottnt{A}  \rfloor }{}{}{}{\ottcom{destination type}}}

\newcommand{\ottcontext}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{context}  ,\ \Gamma  ,\ \Delta}{::=}{\ottcom{typing context}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\emptyset}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\textcolor{blue}{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  \sqcup  \Delta}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottterminals}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{terminals}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \lambda }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mapsto }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \otimes }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \oplus }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \multimap }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ := }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \vdash }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \sqcup }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ {:} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \,;\, }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \cap }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \emptyset }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottformula}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{formula}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{judgement}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottJctx}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{Jctx}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\Gamma  \cap  \Delta  \ottsym{=} \, \emptyset}{}{}{}{\ottcom{$\Gamma$ and $\Delta$ are disjoint typing contexts}}}

\newcommand{\ottJtype}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{Jtype}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{$\ottnt{t}$ is a well-typed term of type $\ottnt{A}$ given typing context $\Gamma$}}}

\newcommand{\ottjudgement}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{judgement}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{Jctx}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{Jtype}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottuserXXsyntax}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{user\_syntax}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\textcolor{blue}{metavariable}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{term}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{type}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{context}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{terminals}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnJctxd}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \cap  \Delta  \ottsym{=} \, \emptyset$}{\ottcom{$\Gamma$ and $\Delta$ are disjoint typing contexts}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJctx}{
\ottdefnJctxd{}}

% defns Jtype
%% defn Jtypec
\newcommand{\ottdruleJtypecXXVar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\textcolor{blue}{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \textcolor{blue}{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Jtypec\_Var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleJtypecXXUnit}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\emptyset  \vdash  \ottsym{()}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{1}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Jtypec\_Unit}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleJtypecXXLam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \sqcup  \textcolor{blue}{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{\{}  \lambda  \textcolor{blue}{x}  {:}  \ottnt{A}  \mapsto  \ottsym{t\}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \multimap  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Jtypec\_Lam}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleJtypecXXApp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \multimap  \ottnt{B}}%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{u}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \cap  \Delta  \ottsym{=} \, \emptyset}%
}{
\Gamma  \sqcup  \Delta  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t} \, \ottnt{u}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Jtypec\_App}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleJtypecXXPatU}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{1}}%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{u}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \cap  \Delta  \ottsym{=} \, \emptyset}%
}{
\Gamma  \sqcup  \Delta  \vdash  \ottkw{case} \, \ottnt{t} \, \ottkw{of} \, \ottsym{\{}  \ottsym{()}  \mapsto  \ottnt{u}  \ottsym{\}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Jtypec\_PatU}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleJtypecXXPatP}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \otimes  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \sqcup  \textcolor{blue}{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqcup  \textcolor{blue}{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{u}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \cap  \Delta  \ottsym{=} \, \emptyset}%
}{
\Gamma  \sqcup  \Delta  \vdash  \ottkw{case} \, \ottnt{t} \, \ottkw{of} \, \ottsym{\{}  \ottsym{(}  \textcolor{blue}{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \textcolor{blue}{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \mapsto  \ottnt{u}  \ottsym{\}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Jtypec\_PatP}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleJtypecXXPatS}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \oplus  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \sqcup  \textcolor{blue}{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{u_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \sqcup  \textcolor{blue}{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{u_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \cap  \Delta  \ottsym{=} \, \emptyset}%
}{
\Gamma  \sqcup  \Delta  \vdash  \ottkw{case} \, \ottnt{t} \, \ottkw{of} \, \ottsym{\{}  \ottsym{1}  \ottsym{.}  \textcolor{blue}{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mapsto  \ottnt{u_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{2}  \ottsym{.}  \textcolor{blue}{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \mapsto  \ottnt{u_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Jtypec\_PatS}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleJtypecXXAlloc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}   \lfloor  \ottnt{A}  \rfloor   \multimap  \ottsym{1}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottkw{alloc} \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Jtypec\_Alloc}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleJtypecXXFillL}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}   \lfloor  \ottnt{A}  \rfloor }%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{u}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \cap  \Delta  \ottsym{=} \, \emptyset}%
}{
\Gamma  \sqcup  \Delta  \vdash  \ottkw{fillLeaf} \, \ottnt{u} \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{1}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Jtypec\_FillL}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleJtypecXXFillVOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}   \lfloor  \ottnt{A}  \oplus  \ottnt{B}  \rfloor }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottkw{fillLeft} \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}   \lfloor  \ottnt{A}  \rfloor }{%
{\ottdrulename{Jtypec\_FillV1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleJtypecXXFillVTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}   \lfloor  \ottnt{A}  \oplus  \ottnt{B}  \rfloor }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottkw{fillRight} \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}   \lfloor  \ottnt{B}  \rfloor }{%
{\ottdrulename{Jtypec\_FillV2}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleJtypecXXFillP}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}   \lfloor  \ottnt{A}  \otimes  \ottnt{B}  \rfloor }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottkw{fillPair} \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}   \lfloor  \ottnt{A}  \rfloor   \otimes   \lfloor  \ottnt{B}  \rfloor }{%
{\ottdrulename{Jtypec\_FillP}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleJtypecXXSub}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \sqcup  \textcolor{blue}{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{u}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \cap  \Delta  \ottsym{=} \, \emptyset}%
}{
\Gamma  \sqcup  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{[}  \textcolor{blue}{x}  :=  \ottnt{u}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Jtypec\_Sub}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnJtypec}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}$}{\ottcom{$\ottnt{t}$ is a well-typed term of type $\ottnt{A}$ given typing context $\Gamma$}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleJtypecXXVar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleJtypecXXUnit{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleJtypecXXLam{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleJtypecXXApp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleJtypecXXPatU{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleJtypecXXPatP{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleJtypecXXPatS{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleJtypecXXAlloc{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleJtypecXXFillL{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleJtypecXXFillVOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleJtypecXXFillVTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleJtypecXXFillP{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleJtypecXXSub{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJtype}{
\ottdefnJtypec{}}

\ottdefnsJctx
\ottdefnsJtype
}

\ottdefnss}
